text:
@SpeakerPelosi How many people are avoiding or delaying testing/treatment for fear of medical costs?

Our profit-driven health care patchwork is too confusing and not all insurance plans are waiving out-of-pocket costs.
https://t.co/ObQQiwWhg7

We need you to lead on Medicare for All. #HR1384

domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks
